statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE employee_name = 'Alice';
SELECT employee_name, certification FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification = 'AWS';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification, employee_name FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_id, training_date FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification = 'CompTIA';
SELECT employee_name, certification FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification = 'Java Developer' ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification LIKE 'Cert%' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT certification FROM EmployeeTraining;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_personnel;
SELECT employee_name, training_status FROM wind_farm_personnel;
SELECT certification_name, certification_expiry_date FROM training_certifications;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM wind_farm_personnel WHERE training_status = TRUE;
SELECT certification_name, certification_expiry_date FROM training_certifications WHERE certification_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_personnel WHERE training_status = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM wind_farm_personnel WHERE training_status = FALSE;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM wind_farm_personnel JOIN training_certifications ON employee_id = certification_id;
SELECT employee_name, certification_expiry_date FROM wind_farm_personnel JOIN training_certifications ON employee_id = certification_id WHERE certification_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_personnel ORDER BY employee_name DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_name, certification_status FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE valid_period > 12;
SELECT certification_name, certification_id FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_id DESC;
SELECT training_name, training_date FROM training WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY training_date;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees, certifications WHERE employees.certification_status = true;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.employee_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT training_name, training_date FROM training WHERE training_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, valid_period FROM certifications WHERE valid_period >= 1 AND valid_period <= 3;
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_personnel;
SELECT employee_name, training_title FROM wind_farm_personnel WHERE certification_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT session_date, session_duration, trainer_name FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_personnel WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, certification_level FROM wind_farm_personnel WHERE certification_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT material_title, material_type, material_link FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_duration, trainer_name FROM training_sessions WHERE session_duration > 60 ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, certification FROM employees WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, validity_period FROM certifications ORDER BY validity_period DESC;
SELECT employee_name, trainer_name, training_date FROM training WHERE training_name LIKE 'Basic%';

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, ec.issue_date, ec.expiration_date FROM employees e JOIN employee_certifications ec ON e.employee_id = ec.employee_id JOIN certifications c ON c.certification_id = ec.certification_id WHERE c.validity_period > 1;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT employee_name, certification FROM employees WHERE certification = 'Java'
SELECT training_name, trainer_name FROM training WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, ec.issue_date, ec.expiration_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN employee_certifications ec ON e.employee_id = ec.employee_id INNER JOIN certifications c ON ec.certification_id = c.certification_id
SELECT et.employee_id, t.training_name FROM employee_training et INNER JOIN training t ON et.training_id = t.training_id WHERE et.attendance_status = 'Present'
